description: I tried some players on KDE Discover, I only found this is the best suit for my needs. The UI is oldschool, and repeat '&' mark on tab. But the fuctionality is the best.. I tried to add simple queue music over SMB by simple click. It has feature to add Custom location from location over SMB when Elisa (KDE) is lagging. Also have music scrapper and lyrics by default.

Works well on Debian 12 KDE
Right click any area to customize is awsome
Very easy organisation methords in this app
Awsome features, visually appealing and no issues
summary: The best music player for GNOME. Hands down

description: This is also my favorite player. It is derived from Clementine, while Clementine derives from Amarok 1.4. Amarok 1.4 was the best player, and it was ruined by Amarok 2, and then Amarok was ruined completely. Clementine, after Exaile, took the practices of Amarok 1 and made a player that works like that (i. e. works perfectly because of many years of experience). Clementine got stalled, and Strawberry serves as further develpoment and actualization for the whole Amarok 1 concept of managing music.
Works well with the Audio Control plugin but freezes when scrolling through music too fast.

Good to see someone keeping Clementine up to date!

Unlike Clementine, Strawberry displays well on a HiDPI screen on KDE Plasma. Also like the Context and Collection organsiation as better.
summary: Excellent up to date version of Clementine

description: I only have around 13,000 songs but does a great job of organizing them all! I especially like the ability to autofind lyrics.
Unable to find second hard drive or network drive. That is where all my music resides. This looks like a great program, but without that capability it's no good to me. Sorry.
Best music manager for linux. I think that visuals could be improve but it also allows for interface personalization so not a big problem. Overall a great great app
Does everything I need it to do.
The best music player I have found if you have a lot of local music files. Works really well and looks nice while doing its job.

I've tried a good number of music players for use on Steam Deck, and this is by far the most functional and best looking one I've tried. If you're looking for a way to listen to your own local tunes while gaming on the Deck, install this in Desktop Mode, add to Steam as a non-Steam game, and return to Gaming Mode. Boot it up, switch out to your game of choice, and enjoy.
This is good. It would be better if I can play wma file easily without adding anything. Just from this software alone should be enough.
Best collection manager i've tried!

This is the only thing I've found so far, that can competently replace foobar2000 for me. The file management features, tagging, and UI are all perfectly functional for me. My previous issue with other music players has been the lack of file management features similar to foobar2000.

Wholeheartedly recommended.
This is my favourite music player, but it did cost me a lot of time today when trying to tag my music properly.
For me, this is by far the best player for a large music collection
Solved my problems with playback using an external dac.
i sure love spending an hour putting my music into folders only to have it mashed together with no option to fix it. use vlc instead

Like that some things do work...ie Lyrics, internet radio... However, playlists are awful. They continuously add duplicates, and smart playlists flat out just do not work. App freezes and hangs with selecting more than 400 songs. Have to kill process to get it to close...

I use MusicBee on Windows, which does these things without a hiccup...

The search for a music app that works continues.....

This is my favourite music player. It has excellent support for managing various playlists and is one of the best when it comes to performing well with very long playlists. I also like the very functional and no nonsense user interface. It also has one of the best playback quality. Also very nice for editing music file tags. It can even play music from Tidal. The response from developers on feedback is also very quick.
My experience with Strawberry has been exellent, but beware, this flatpak has some issues, particularly around MP3s, so I would recommend installing from a different source
Perfection radios
Does everything I want fast without looking cluttered
Sure, it looks like it's from 2003. But the damn thing plays music and manages the current play queue in _perfect_ fashion. Throw in the equilizer visualization, and I feel like a young man again.
Nice music player!
Il miglior organizzatore e lettore musicale per Linux che abbia trovato. Stabile e compatibile. Installato in lingua italiana! :O (Debian GNU/Linux 12)
It finds several musics' letter for us and give us and it is cross-plataforms
Definitely the best music player is Strawberry v. 0.6.7. No bugs, searches and displays song covers and lyrics, supports many themes, a great graphical equalizer as well as a user friendly interface.
Use Strawberry as a better version
I use it on a regular bases during my dance classes. I like the fact, that you can connect it to musicbrains, because students tend to ask for songs.
summary: One of my favourite Music Players

description: Ein schöner Player und gute Alternative zu Amarok
Sin Dudas el mejor reproductor de Musica de GNU, tiene muchisimas funciones extras que lo convierten en lo mejor de su segmento!

Es rápida, clara, simple, intuitiva y tiene todo a mano. Era fanático de Jukebox y me encontré con Strawberry, enorme alegría. Sin artificios innecesarios, con todo todo lo que se necesita en un reproductor!
Excelente reproductor.
I really liked Clementine, but it was buggy, and unmantained. Happy that this proyect is alive
Digno heredero del querido Clementine

Elisa, VLC y la mayoría de programas similares están pensados para música pop, por lo que las etiquetas ID3 'COMPOSER' o 'PERFORMER' las ignoran completamente y es imposible tener la colección de música ordenada por autores. 
Strawberry sí permite establecer una jerarquía de ordenación que toma en cuenta la etiqueta del composityor de una pieza, de forma que es posible oprdenar la colección según la jerarquía Compositor/Álbum/Intérprete, que sigue sin ser perfecta (a Strawberry le falta admitir la etiqueta 'WORK' y ya la ordenación sí que sería perfecta: Comp./Obra/Int.) pero es bastante más inteligente que la chapuza habitual de "Artista"/Álbum.
También necesita una actualización de la interfaz y una mejor integración con KDE 5 y 6, ya que el diseño sigue un poco anclado en los tiempos de cuando era Clementine.

Por todo ello no le doy las 5 estrellas pero lo sigo recomendando para todo el que tenga una colección de música artística o no pero le guste priorizar a los verdaderos creadores de la música sobre sus intérpretes.
summary: EL mejor reproductor para música artística desde Amarok

description: Pour un reboot de Clementine, et d’Amarok, je suis agréablement surpris par ce programme en flatpak. À défaut d’avoir un Amarok stable, Strawberry apporte des fonctionnalités intéressantes. Il ne manque que la possibilité de mettre des « étoiles » au clavier et la possibilité d’inscrire ça dans le morceau de musique en cours de lecture.
visuel des pochettes, simple, efficace, dans l'esprit gnome en qt

je regrette qu'il ne soit pas par défaut à la place de clémentine dans la pluspart des distros (incluant la mienne, opensuse).
Développeur dévoué.
mon appli audio preferé pour lire les musiques de mon disque. rapide leger complet respectueux de nos données et totalement paramétrable s'integre parfaitment à kde.
Je suis pas un audiphile ou un spécialiste (peut petre des reglages sont à faire) mais je trouve que la musique sonne mieux sur élisa, puis strawberry puis toutes les autres applis tésté, rien de grave.

Je l'utilise dans l'environnement Gnome de Debian
le successeur d'Amarok et de Clementine...
самый лучший для убунты
pretty good but please change the icon thank you
summary: pretty good but please change the icon thank you

description: Clementine и Amarok померли, теперь этот плеер самый новый. Всё работает, даже cue понимает. Полной поддержки 4к нет, но есть возможность немного поднастроить так, чтобы не очень мелко было. Жаль только, что нельзя расширить список радиостанций. Фонотеку можно просматривать как по тегам, так и по папкам. Нет разве что вставки статьи википедии, как в Amarok. Во всём остальном плеер лучший, шустро работает и не глючит.
Отличный Плеер---полностью похож на Climentine

Умеет работать с другими дисками(NTFS).
Хорошая организация инерфейса.
Есть конвертор аудиофайлов.
summary: Советую. Это VLC в мире аудиплееров

description: рекоменую как основной плеер.
